content:
/>
VIII.iii.10.1.b
.
Nomenclature for COVID-19
A claim for SC for the following conditions should be construed as a claim for the same disease:
novel coronavirus
Coronavirus
severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2
coronavirus disease, and
COVID-19.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 10 - Presumptive Service Connection (SC) for Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19)
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 10, Section None
